name: Industrial Outpost
content:
Industrial Outpost

A fortified industrial facility on the edge of civilization. Primary Objectives are supply depots. Secondary markers are watchtowers or communication arrays. The perimeter is lined with defensive structures and warning signs.


Terrain Features:

  • Supply depots
  • Watchtowers
  • Communication arrays
  • Defensive structures

Atmosphere:

The air is filled with the smell of oil and metal. Warning sirens occasionally pierce the silence, and searchlights sweep the perimeter. The ground is marked with tire tracks and the scars of heavy machinery.
